am_routine.name: Cleanser
am_routine.long: Gently purifies your skin, removing overnight buildup and preparing it for the day ahead.

types.name: Gel Cleanser
types.description: A clear, often foaming cleanser that deeply purifies skin by effectively removing excess oil and impurities.

types.name: Cream Cleanser
types.description: A rich, non-foaming cleanser that gently cleanses while delivering hydration, leaving the skin feeling soft and nourished.

types.name: Foam Cleanser
types.description: Creates a rich, airy lather upon contact with water, providing a thorough cleanse that efficiently removes impurities and light makeup residue.

types.name: Micellar Water
types.description: A no-rinse cleanser using tiny oil micelles to effortlessly attract and lift away dirt, oil, and makeup.

types.name: Powder Cleanser
types.description: A water-activated cleanser in powder form that transforms into a gentle, creamy or foamy lather, often with mild exfoliants for polished skin.

types.name: Bar Cleanser
types.description: A solid cleanser in bar form, often formulated to be soap-free and pH-balanced, providing cleansing benefits tailored by its ingredients.
types.best_for: Varies by formula (e.g., oily, dry, sensitive)

types.name: Balm Cleanser
types.description: A solid cleanser that transforms into a luxurious oil upon skin contact, effectively melting away stubborn makeup and impurities while nourishing skin.
types.best_for: All skin types, especially dry and mature

types.name: Cleansing Wipes
types.description: Pre-moistened disposable cloths designed for quick and convenient removal of makeup, dirt, and impurities when traditional cleansing isn't possible.

am_routine.name: Toner
am_routine.long: Restores your skin's pH balance and preps it for better absorption of subsequent products, ensuring no residue is left behind.

types.name: Hydrating Toner
types.description: Replenishes skin's moisture content, often with humectants, and prepares it to better absorb subsequent skincare products.

types.name: Exfoliating Toner
types.description: Contains gentle acids (AHAs or BHAs) that effectively sweep away dead skin cells and promote skin cell turnover for a smoother texture.

types.name: Balancing Toner
types.description: Helps to rebalance the skin's pH level and regulate oil production, minimizing shine and tightening the appearance of pores.

types.name: Soothing Toner
types.description: Formulated with calming ingredients to reduce redness, irritation, and inflammation, providing comfort to delicate skin.

types.name: Brightening Toner
types.description: Targets uneven skin tone and dullness, helping to reduce the appearance of dark spots and promote a more radiant complexion.
types.best_for: Dull, hyperpigmented, and uneven skin tone

types.name: Clarifying Toner
types.description: Deeply cleanses pores, removes excess sebum, and helps prevent breakouts, often containing ingredients with astringent or antibacterial properties.

am_routine.name: Serum
am_routine.long: Delivers concentrated active ingredients deep into your skin, addressing specific concerns like hydration, brightness, or environmental protection.

types.name: Vitamin C Serum
types.description: Delivers potent antioxidants to protect skin from environmental damage, neutralize free radicals, and brighten the complexion.
types.best_for: All skin types, especially dull, uneven, and aging skin

types.name: Hyaluronic Acid Serum
types.description: Infuses skin with intense hydration by attracting and holding water, visibly plumping and smoothing fine lines.
types.best_for: All skin types, especially dry and dehydrated skin

types.name: Niacinamide Serum
types.description: Helps to minimize the appearance of pores, reduce redness, improve skin tone, and strengthen the skin's barrier function.
types.best_for: All skin types, especially oily, acne-prone, and sensitive skin

types.name: Antioxidant Serum (General)
types.description: Provides broad protection against environmental aggressors like pollution, preventing cellular damage and premature aging.
types.best_for: All skin types, especially those concerned with environmental exposure and aging

types.name: Brightening Serum
types.description: Targets hyperpigmentation, dark spots, and dullness, working to even out skin tone and enhance overall radiance.
types.best_for: Dull, hyperpigmented, and uneven skin tone

types.name: Hydrating Serum
types.description: Offers concentrated, lightweight moisture that penetrates deeply, alleviating dryness and restoring skin suppleness.

am_routine.name: Eye Cream
am_routine.long: Hydrates and nurtures the fragile skin around your eyes, targeting specific concerns such as fine lines, puffiness, or dark circles.

types.name: Hydrating Eye Cream
types.description: Provides essential moisture to the delicate skin around the eyes, plumping it to reduce the appearance of dehydration lines.

types.name: Brightening Eye Cream
types.description: Formulated with ingredients that help to visibly reduce the appearance of dark circles and illuminate the under-eye area.

types.name: Firming Eye Cream
types.description: Targets loss of elasticity and aims to improve the skin's resilience around the eyes, often helping to reduce the look of puffiness.

types.name: Anti-Aging Eye Cream
types.description: Contains active ingredients to address and minimize the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles, and crow's feet for a smoother look.
types.best_for: Mature skin and concerns with fine lines

am_routine.name: Spot Treatment
am_routine.long: Applies a concentrated treatment directly to individual blemishes or problem areas to reduce their appearance quickly.

types.name: Salicylic Acid Spot Treatment
types.description: Penetrates oil within pores to exfoliate and reduce inflammation, effectively targeting active breakouts and blackheads.

types.name: Benzoyl Peroxide Spot Treatment
types.description: Kills acne-causing bacteria and helps to dry out active pimples, reducing their size and redness.

types.name: Hydrocolloid Patch
types.description: A discreet, self-adhesive patch that absorbs fluid from blemishes, protects them from bacteria, and promotes faster healing.
types.best_for: All skin types with active, pus-filled blemishes

types.name: Sulfur Spot Treatment
types.description: Reduces inflammation and dries out blemishes by absorbing excess oil and gently exfoliating the skin.

types.name: Tea Tree Oil Spot Treatment
types.description: A natural antiseptic that helps to reduce inflammation and kill acne-causing bacteria, suitable for targeted application.
types.best_for: Oily, acne-prone, and sensitive skin (when diluted)

am_routine.name: Moisturizer
am_routine.long: Hydrates and strengthens your skin's protective barrier, sealing in moisture and protecting it from environmental stressors throughout the day.

types.name: Gel Moisturizer
types.description: A lightweight, often oil-free formula that provides hydration without feeling heavy, absorbing quickly into the skin.

types.name: Lotion Moisturizer
types.description: A medium-weight formula offering balanced hydration and barrier support, suitable for daily use without greasiness.
types.best_for: Normal, combination, and slightly dry skin

types.name: Cream Moisturizer
types.description: A rich, emollient formula providing deep hydration and robust barrier support, ideal for comforting dry or compromised skin.
types.best_for: Dry, very dry, and mature skin

types.name: Tinted Moisturizer
types.description: Combines hydration with a sheer tint to lightly even out skin tone, offering a minimal coverage option.
types.best_for: All skin types desiring light coverage and hydration

am_routine.name: Face Oil
am_routine.long: Provides an additional layer of nourishment and seals in moisture, leaving your skin feeling supple and adding a healthy glow.

types.name: Lightweight Face Oil
types.description: A fast-absorbing oil that provides a gentle layer of moisture and enhances skin's natural glow without feeling heavy.

types.name: Nourishing Face Oil
types.description: A richer oil that delivers intense moisture, essential fatty acids, and nutrients to support skin barrier health and suppleness.
types.best_for: Dry, very dry, and mature skin

am_routine.name: Sunscreen
am_routine.long: Crucially protects your skin from harmful UV rays, which is essential to prevent sun damage, premature aging, and maintain overall skin health.

types.name: Mineral Sunscreen
types.description: Uses zinc oxide and/or titanium dioxide to create a physical barrier on the skin that reflects UV rays away.

types.name: Chemical Sunscreen
types.description: Contains organic compounds that absorb UV radiation and convert it into heat, which is then released from the skin.

types.name: Hybrid Sunscreen
types.description: Combines both mineral and chemical filters to offer broad-spectrum UV protection with enhanced texture and reduced white cast.
types.best_for: All skin types looking for a balance of protection and aesthetics

types.name: Tinted Sunscreen
types.description: Provides UV protection along with a sheer tint, offering light coverage to even out skin tone.
types.best_for: All skin types desiring minimal makeup and UV protection

pm_routine.name: Oil Cleanser
pm_routine.long: The crucial first step to effectively dissolve and remove oil-based impurities like makeup, sunscreen, and excess sebum accumulated throughout the day.

types.name: Cleansing Oil
types.description: A liquid oil formula designed to effortlessly dissolve oil-based impurities such as stubborn makeup, sunscreen, and excess sebum.
types.best_for: All skin types, especially effective for heavy makeup users and those with dry skin

types.name: Cleansing Balm
types.description: A solid, waxy balm that transforms into a luxurious oil upon skin contact, melting away impurities and often providing nourishing benefits.
types.best_for: All skin types, particularly effective for stubborn makeup and those who enjoy a pampering cleansing experience

pm_routine.name: Water Cleanser
pm_routine.long: The essential second step that removes any lingering water-based impurities and ensures a thorough clean, optimally preparing your skin for treatments.

types.name: Gel Cleanser
types.description: A clear, often foaming cleanser that purifies skin and removes water-based impurities like dirt and sweat without stripping.

types.name: Foam Cleanser
types.description: Produces a rich, airy lather for a thorough cleanse, effectively removing residual impurities and ensuring a deep clean.

types.name: Cream Cleanser
types.description: A rich, non-foaming cleanser that gently cleanses while maintaining skin hydration, leaving it feeling soft and balanced.

pm_routine.name: Exfoliant
pm_routine.long: Gently removes dead skin cells to improve texture and clarity, revealing smoother, fresher skin underneath.

types.name: AHA Exfoliant
types.description: Contains Alpha Hydroxy Acids (like Glycolic or Lactic Acid) that chemically exfoliate the skin's surface, improving texture, tone, and promoting brightness.
types.best_for: Dull, dry, sun-damaged, and uneven skin

types.name: BHA Exfoliant
types.description: Contains Beta Hydroxy Acids (like Salicylic Acid) that penetrate oil within pores to exfoliate, helping to clear congestion and reduce breakouts.

types.name: Enzyme Exfoliant
types.description: Uses fruit enzymes (like papaya or pineapple) to gently break down dead skin cells on the surface, offering a mild exfoliating action suitable for sensitive skin.
types.best_for: Sensitive, dull, and mildly uneven skin

types.name: Physical Exfoliant
types.description: Uses small particles or a textured brush to manually buff away dead skin cells from the skin's surface, improving smoothness.

pm_routine.name: Toner
pm_routine.long: Restores your skin's balance after cleansing and provides an initial layer of hydration, optimizing the absorption of subsequent treatment products.

types.name: Hydrating Toner
types.description: Replenishes moisture, often with humectants, and provides an initial layer of hydration, optimizing absorption of subsequent night treatments.

types.name: Exfoliating Toner
types.description: Contains acids to aid in nightly cell turnover, improving skin texture and clarity by gently removing dead skin cells overnight.

types.name: Repairing Toner
types.description: Delivers concentrated active ingredients that support the skin's natural regeneration and repair processes during the night.
types.best_for: All skin types, especially those concerned with barrier repair and overall skin health

types.name: Soothing Toner
types.description: Formulated with calming ingredients to reduce redness and irritation, providing comfort and relief to sensitive or compromised skin overnight.

pm_routine.name: Serum
pm_routine.long: Delivers potent active ingredients tailored to address specific concerns like aging or hyperpigmentation, working with your skin's natural regeneration cycle overnight.

types.name: Retinoid Serum
types.description: Contains derivatives of Vitamin A (like retinol or retinal) that promote cell turnover, reduce signs of aging, and improve skin texture and tone.
types.best_for: Mature skin, acne-prone skin, and concerns with texture and hyperpigmentation

types.name: Peptide Serum
types.description: Features short chains of amino acids that signal skin cells to produce more collagen and elastin, leading to firmer, more resilient skin.
types.best_for: Mature skin, concerns with firmness and elasticity

types.name: Niacinamide Serum
types.description: Works overnight to minimize pore appearance, reduce redness, regulate oil production, and strengthen the skin's barrier.
types.best_for: Oily, acne-prone, sensitive, and uneven skin tone

types.name: Hyaluronic Acid Serum
types.description: Delivers deep and sustained hydration to the skin, helping to plump up fine lines and support the skin's moisture barrier during its nightly repair cycle.

types.name: AHA/BHA Serum
types.description: Contains exfoliating acids that work to gently resurface the skin overnight, improving texture, unclogging pores, and enhancing radiance.
types.best_for: Dull, congested, acne-prone, and uneven skin

pm_routine.name: Eye Cream
pm_routine.long: Supports the delicate skin around your eyes during its nightly repair process, targeting concerns like dark circles, fine lines, and puffiness for a refreshed look.

types.name: Nourishing Eye Cream
types.description: Provides rich moisture and essential nutrients to support the delicate eye area's repair process while you sleep.

types.name: Anti-Aging Eye Cream
types.description: Formulated with active ingredients to specifically target and reduce the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles, and crow's feet around the eyes.
types.best_for: Mature skin and concerns with visible signs of aging

types.name: Dark Circle Eye Cream
types.description: Contains ingredients designed to visibly diminish the appearance of dark circles by targeting pigmentation and improving circulation.
types.best_for: Dark circles and dullness around the eyes

types.name: Depuffing Eye Cream
types.description: Helps to reduce fluid retention and inflammation, visibly de-puffing the under-eye area for a more rested appearance by morning.

pm_routine.name: Moisturizer
pm_routine.long: Provides intense hydration and nourishment, supporting your skin's natural regeneration and repair processes while you sleep for a revitalized morning complexion.

types.name: Rich Cream Moisturizer
types.description: A deeply emollient and nourishing formula providing intense hydration and robust barrier support, crucial for overnight skin repair.
types.best_for: Dry, very dry, and mature skin

types.name: Gel Cream Moisturizer
types.description: A lightweight, often hydrating formula that provides balanced moisture without feeling heavy, suitable for night use on oilier skin types.

types.name: Anti-Aging Moisturizer
types.description: Contains specific ingredients like peptides or antioxidants designed to actively target and reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles while you sleep.
types.best_for: Mature skin and concerns with visible signs of aging

types.name: Repairing Moisturizer
types.description: Focuses on strengthening the skin's barrier and supporting its natural healing process, often with ingredients like ceramides.
types.best_for: Damaged barrier, sensitive, and compromised skin

pm_routine.name: Sleeping Mask
pm_routine.long: Creates an occlusive barrier to lock in all previous layers of hydration and treatment, providing enhanced absorption and aiding in overnight skin repair.

types.name: Hydrating Sleeping Mask
types.description: Forms an occlusive layer to prevent moisture loss and deeply infuse the skin with hydrating ingredients throughout the night.

types.name: Brightening Sleeping Mask
types.description: Works overnight to visibly reduce dark spots, even out skin tone, and enhance overall radiance by morning.
types.best_for: Dullness, hyperpigmentation, and uneven skin tone

types.name: Soothing Sleeping Mask
types.description: Designed to calm irritated or sensitive skin, reducing redness and discomfort while providing intense overnight comfort.

types.name: Firming Sleeping Mask
types.description: Contains ingredients that support skin elasticity and firmness, aiming to provide a more lifted and toned appearance by morning.
types.best_for: Mature skin and concerns with loss of firmness
